name: Website Trial Version
author: Marco Brandino

sections.description:
Do you want to get paid every time, and in time? Install this simple plugin that puts the website offline until you receive the payment.
The website will be in Trial mode. Every day a notification box appears on the screen reminding the customer how many days are left before the website goes offline.
On the last day the website goes offline and a warning message appears, prompting to contact the administrator. Once you get the payment, you deactivate the plugin and the website is again online.

It’s simple to use.
Just a few fields to fill in, like the position of the notification box, the background color, the message.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/website-trial-version directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->WTV Options screen to configure the plugin
  4. Set the fields
sections.faq:
Does this work with Multisite

I don’t know, but we’ll look into it soon!

short_description: Small and simple plugin that allows you to set a trial period for your website.

screenshots.caption: Website Trial Version Options page, where you are able to set customized colours, messages, position.
